info.name: InoReader Bigger CardView
info.description:
InoReader CardView
Make the card bigger
2*3 = 6 cards per page.

适合在卡片模式看图片类feed，当然包括Tumblr，贼爽，谁用谁知道
info.additionalInfo:
thanks to Eugene Veprytskyi 's Inoreader 2017 v2.1(07/12/2017) https://userstyles.org/styles/148178/
